mapper.insert: INSERT INTO problem (siteID, name, link) VALUES (#{siteID}, #{name}, #{link})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM problem WHERE siteID=#{siteID} AND name=#{name} AND link=#{link}
SELECT id FROM problem WHERE name=#{name} AND siteID=#{siteID}

SELECT problem.id, userProblem.problemID, COUNT(*) as count, problem.name, problem.link, problem.siteID as siteID, codingSite.siteName as siteName, codingSite.siteUrl as siteUrl, problem.regdate FROM ((problem INNER JOIN codingSite ON problem.siteID = codingSite.id) INNER JOIN userProblem ON problem.id = userProblem.problemID) GROUP BY problem.id;
